text: Hopea thorelii is a species of plant in the family Dipterocarpaceae; the species is named after the French botanist Clovis Thorel. It is found in Laos and Thailand. ==References== thorelii Category:Flora of Laos Category:Trees of Laos Category:Trees of Thailand Category:Critically endangered flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hopea thorelii
